results.content: The sundog materials don't work (Most likely I would have to download the materials, but thats not allowed on a company device). This course shows how to build your implementations of ML solutions. It doesn't show you how to apply ML, DS or DL as problem solving tools, which is what actually empowers someone to create value using these skills.
results.content_html: The sundog materials don't work (Most likely I would have to download the materials, but thats not allowed on a company device). This course shows how to build your implementations of ML solutions. It doesn't show you how to apply ML, DS or DL as problem solving tools, which is what actually empowers someone to create value using these skills.

results.content: That's a really great place to learn data science from zero background knowledge of math or computer science. If you already know a bit of math it could be frustrating the lack of deeper analysis on those topics
results.content_html: That's a really great place to learn data science from zero background knowledge of math or computer science. If you already know a bit of math it could be frustrating the lack of deeper analysis on those topics

results.content: Second course from Frank I took. Just all-round great: crystal clear and compelling presentation, hands-on exercises well supplemented by prerequisite theory and very good quality of sound and video.
results.content_html: Second course from Frank I took. Just all-round great: crystal clear and compelling presentation, hands-on exercises well supplemented by prerequisite theory and very good quality of sound and video.

results.content: The course is amazing as the lecturer is too good at articulating concepts with real world examples, which makes the concepts more understandable. I would recommend this course to anyone who has basic coding knowledge,  and has interest in this domain.
results.content_html: The course is amazing as the lecturer is too good at articulating concepts with real world examples, which makes the concepts more understandable. I would recommend this course to anyone who has basic coding knowledge, and has interest in this domain.

results.content: Its pretty fast.  I am using it more as a reference point to go search and learn the concepts that are being shown in the videos and learning it that way.  Not really learning from the videos.
results.content_html: Its pretty fast. I am using it more as a reference point to go search and learn the concepts that are being shown in the videos and learning it that way. Not really learning from the videos.

results.content: It is an awesome course on Data Science and Machine Learning. It gives a great foundation for practicing DS and ML in real Life. Thank you Frank for such a great course.
results.content_html: It is an awesome course on Data Science and Machine Learning. It gives a great foundation for practicing DS and ML in real Life. Thank you Frank for such a great course.

results.content: Really taught the basics of ML and Data science..By the end of the course I was able to develop a few ML models myself..Will practice more and visit these examples in the upcoming future
results.content_html: Really taught the basics of ML and Data science..By the end of the course I was able to develop a few ML models myself..Will practice more and visit these examples in the upcoming future

results.content: This was a perfect course for a newbie to data science and machine learning. The trainer was very effective in setting the basics right before deep diving into using them. Excellent collection of examples, data sets, and real-life scenarios. Especially loved the part where I learned the algorithms behind streaming service movie recommendations. It took a while for me to wrap my head around tensor flow, but that is just me. Overall a great first course to set the basics right.
results.content_html: This was a perfect course for a newbie to data science and machine learning. The trainer was very effective in setting the basics right before deep diving into using them. Excellent collection of examples, data sets, and real-life scenarios. Especially loved the part where I learned the algorithms behind streaming service movie recommendations. It took a while for me to wrap my head around tensor flow, but that is just me. Overall a great first course to set the basics right.

results.content: Very relevant and well-structured. I will be using these skills immediately and I will use this course as a reference as I go!
results.content_html: Very relevant and well-structured. I will be using these skills immediately and I will use this course as a reference as I go!

results.content: It was easy to follow along and appreciate the detailed notebooks! I would recommend that the people who take this course have some background data science courses under their belt as some of the concepts were very technical, but overall I thought this course was great!
results.content_html: It was easy to follow along and appreciate the detailed notebooks! I would recommend that the people who take this course have some background data science courses under their belt as some of the concepts were very technical, but overall I thought this course was great!

results.content: This course is well designed. It was really helpful to recover acquired knowledge many years ago in my Undergraduate Machine Learning Course, and to update to new topics.
results.content_html: This course is well designed. It was really helpful to recover acquired knowledge many years ago in my Undergraduate Machine Learning Course, and to update to new topics.

results.content: Nice overview of a broad set up topics at a good pace with plenty of hands-on excercises.
results.content_html: Nice overview of a broad set up topics at a good pace with plenty of hands-on excercises.
